product_title: Premium Woven Denim EFG Fashion BLACK PANTHER Jeans Pant Export Quality Garments Washed Black Color Slim Fit

detail.name: Premium Woven Denim EFG Fashion BLACK PANTHER Jeans Pant Export Quality Garments Washed Black Color Slim Fit

details.description_text: • Premium Woven Denim BLACK PANTHER Jeans Pant • Slim Fit, Washed Black Color, 5 Pocket Style • Full Length, Zip Fly, Whisker, Garments Washed • Denim Material, 98% Cotton, 2% Elastane • All Weather, Casual Style, Export Quality GarmentsIntroducing the Premium Woven Denim EFG Fashion BLACK PANTHER Jeans Pant, the perfect addition to your wardrobe. Made with high-quality denim material, this slim-fit pant comes in a washed black color with whisker details, giving it a stylish and trendy look. The 5-pocket design adds functionality to the pant, making it perfect for casual wear. The zip fly ensures a secure fit, while the full-length design makes it suitable for all weather conditions. This denim pant is made with 98% cotton and 2% elastane, ensuring comfort and durability. The EFG Fashion brand is known for its export quality garments, making this pant a must-have for any fashion-conscious individual.
